question: Q1. In what year Liverpool F.C. founded?
Q2. Who is the founder of the club?

Q3. Under which coach did Liverpool win its first two English 
 championships?

Q4. Against which team did Liverpool face in the 1914 
 FA Cup final?
Q5. What were the colors of Liverpool's first home outfits?

Q6. How many years have fans of The Reds waited to win a 
 trophy since 1947, when they first won the post-war title?

Q7. Who came to The Reds as manager in December 1959 
 and later became a club legend during the great depression?

Q8. In what year did you manage to win the FA Cup for 
 the first time?

Q9. With which team did the Reds team debut in European 
 cups?

Q10. What is the name of the most famous grandstand 
 at Anfield?

 European cup?

 its reserves'  and 'You're only as good as your last game.' 
 Who is the author of the aforementioned words?

 shirts?

 coach? (excluding friendly tournaments)

 in a red jersey throughout history?

 coaching bench?

Q18. In which season did Liverpool reach the 'triple crown' 
 (English Championship, League Cup, European Cup)?

 final?

 teams actually excluded from European competition after 
 the tragedy at Heysel?

 championship? (with exception of May 2020)

 'You'll Never Walk Alone' sign?

Q24. Who has scored the most goals in the club's entire 
 history?

 and Everton?

 season, when LFC won the 'triple crown' ?

Q27. What was the score until the break in the Champions 
 League final in Istanbul between LFC and Milan?

Q28. What is the name of the training center where the Reds 
 players train? (as of May 2023)

Q29. This team has an extraordinary soul - no matter how high 
 we lose, we always fight until the end. Who is the author 
 of these words?

Q30. With which team did Jurgen Klopp make his debut as 
 manager  of the Reds?
options: in the corridor leading to the pitch
